add:
Installs a package and any packages that it depends on.
By default, any new package is installed as a prod dependency
add -g:
Install a package globally
eg: pnpm add -g typescript
add -D:
Install a package(write to the dependencies of package.json)
eg: pnpm add -D sass
add -S:
Install a package(write to the devDependencies of package.json)
eg: pnpm add -S sass
install:
Alias: i
Command: pnpm install [-g|-D|-S] <package>
Install all dependencies for a project
remove:
Alias: rm
Removes packages from node_modules and from the projects package.json
list:
Alias: ls
Print all the versions of packages that are installed, as well as their dependencies, in a tree-structure
update:
Alias: up
Updates packages to their latest version based on the specified range
import: Generates a pnpm-lock.yaml from an npm package-lock.json (or npm-shrinkwrap.json) file
install-test:
Alias: it
Runs a pnpm install followed immediately by a pnpm test
link:
Alias: ln
Connect the local project to another one
unlink: Unlinks a package. Like yarn unlink but pnpm re-installs the dependency after removing the external link
exec: Executes a shell command in scope of a project
start: Runs an arbitrary command specified in the package's "start" property of its "scripts" object
test:
Alias: t
Runs a package's "test" script, if one was provided
-v:
--version
Print the current version of pnpm
